student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hi there! What's up? You planning a camping trip?
Yes, I is planning a camping trip.
That sounds fun! But remember, camping can be dangerous. You need to be careful.
Yes, I will be careful. I bring food and water.
Good! But don't leave food out. Animals might come. Also, tell someone where you're going.
I will tell my friend where I go. Thank you!
You're welcome! Last thing, check the weather. Don't go if it's too bad. Stay safe out there!
I check the weather. I stay safe. Thank you!
Great job! You're all set for a safe trip. Talk to you later!
